com.dooapp.fxform.view

Interface FXFormNode<N extends javafx.scene.Node>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, DisposableNode<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FXFormChoiceBoxNode, FXFormNodeWrapper

    public interface FXFormNode<N extends javafx.scene.Node>
extends DisposableNode<N>
    This interface is used the enrich a Node with additional information.

    Created at 17/10/11 15:53.
    Author:
    Antoine Mischler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.beans.property.Property getProperty()
      Get the property of the view to bind to the model.
      void init(Element element)
      This method is called before the node is bound to the model if initialization is required.
      boolean isEditable()
      This boolean indicate whether this node allow the user to input values.

      • getProperty

        javafx.beans.property.Property getProperty()
        Get the property of the view to bind to the model.
        Returns:

      • init

        void init(Element element)
        This method is called before the node is bound to the model if initialization is required.
        Parameters:
        element -

      • isEditable

        boolean isEditable()
        This boolean indicate whether this node allow the user to input values. This is used by FXForm to know whether the node should be disabled in some case, e.g. when bound to a read-only model element.
        Returns:
        true is the node is editable, i.e. the user can use it to input values
